career_labels.label: United Nations
career_labels.involvement: Held various leadership roles including Permanent Representative of Tanzania, President of the General Assembly, and Chairman of the Special Committee on Decolonization.
career_labels.reasoning: Long-term and significant leadership roles across multiple UN bodies.

career_labels.label: Organisation of African Unity (OAU)
career_labels.involvement: Served as Secretary General and held other leadership positions within the OAU.
career_labels.reasoning: Long-term leadership role in a major continental organization.

career_labels.label: African Union (AU)
career_labels.involvement: Held roles such as Special Envoy to Darfur, member of the Panel of the Wise, and Chairperson of the AU Commission.
career_labels.reasoning: Significant leadership and advisory roles in the successor organization to the OAU.

career_labels.label: Mo Ibrahim Foundation
career_labels.involvement: Served as a board member and Chair of the Foundation's Prize Committee.
career_labels.reasoning: Long-term involvement in a major foundation focused on African governance.

career_labels.label: African Development Bank
career_labels.reasoning: Significant role in a major continental development institution.

career_labels.label: Tanzanian Government
career_labels.involvement: Held roles including Prime Minister, Minister of Foreign Affairs, and Ambassador to various countries.
career_labels.reasoning: Long-term and high-level involvement in national governance and diplomacy.

career_labels.label: Institute for Security Studies (ISS)
career_labels.involvement: Co-founder and Executive Director, as well as Honorary Patron and President of the Advisory Council.
career_labels.reasoning: Founding and long-term leadership role in a major research institution.

career_labels.label: University of Pretoria
career_labels.involvement: Extraordinary Professor in the Centre of Human Rights and the Department of Political Sciences.
career_labels.reasoning: Significant academic affiliation with a major university.

career_labels.label: Tanganyika African National Union (TANU)
career_labels.involvement: Founding President and leader of the party.
career_labels.reasoning: Founding role in a major political organization.

career_labels.label: Zanzibar Nationalist Party (ZNP)
career_labels.involvement: Held roles including secretary-general of the youth wing and secretary of international relations.
career_labels.reasoning: Early and significant political involvement in a key organization.
